short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Streamlined code snippet manager for Chrome. Save, organize, and access frequently used snippets with ease.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CodeCrafter is a powerful and intuitive Code Snippet Manager extension designed to streamline your development workflow. With CodeCrafter, you can effortlessly save, organize, and access your frequently used code snippets directly within your Chrome browser. Say goodbye to digging through files and folders to find that elusive snippet. CodeCrafter offers a centralized and efficient solution to help you boost your productivity and write cleaner, more efficient code.
